scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-assets && npm run verify-assets
scripts.verify-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); console.log('Verifying assets...'); console.log('public/assets exists:', fs.existsSync('public/assets')); try{const files=fs.readdirSync('public/assets/css'); console.log('CSS files:', files);}catch(e){console.log('Error reading CSS dir:', e.message);}"
